profile.title: Game Developer | Unity / C# | Gameplay Systems
profile.tagline: Creator or experiences, not just code. Building engaging gameplay systems and optimized game architecture.
profile.bio: I am a passionate game developer with over 10 years of experience specializing in Unity and C#. I have a strong background in designing and implementing gameplay systems, optimizing game architecture, and creating engaging player experiences. My expertise includes physics-based mechanics, AI programming, and modular system design. I thrive in collaborative environments and am always eager to learn new technologies and techniques to push the boundaries of game development.
